queries.natural_language: Compare NIM trends across banks for 2023-2024
queries.sql_query:
SELECT B.BANK_NAME, FP.YEAR, FP.YTD_PROFIT
FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE FP
JOIN BANKS B ON FP.BANK_ID = B.BANK_ID
WHERE FP.YEAR = 2024

queries.natural_language: Show Yearly profits for all banks in 2024
queries.sql_query:
SELECT B.BANK_NAME, FP.YEAR, SUM(FP.YTD_PROFIT) AS YEARLY_PROFIT
FROM BANKS B
JOIN FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE FP ON B.BANK_ID = FP.BANK_ID
WHERE FP.YEAR = 2024
GROUP BY B.BANK_NAME, FP.YEAR

SELECT B.BANK_NAME, M.MARKET_CAP_AED_BN, M.MARKET_CAP_USD_BN
FROM BANKS B
JOIN MARKET_DATA M ON B.BANK_ID = M.BANK_ID
WHERE M.YEAR = 2024 AND M.QUARTER = 4

queries.natural_language: Show me the top 5 banks by year-over-year profit growth for 2024
queries.sql_query:
SELECT B.BANK_NAME, 
       (FP_2024.YTD_PROFIT - FP_2023.YTD_PROFIT) / FP_2023.YTD_PROFIT * 100 AS PROFIT_GROWTH
FROM FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE FP_2024
JOIN FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE FP_2023 ON FP_2024.BANK_ID = FP_2023.BANK_ID AND FP_2023.YEAR = 2023
JOIN BANKS B ON FP_2024.BANK_ID = B.BANK_ID
WHERE FP_2024.YEAR = 2024
ORDER BY PROFIT_GROWTH DESC
FETCH FIRST 5 ROWS ONLY

SELECT 
    b.BANK_NAME,
    AVG(fp.YTD_INCOME) AS AVG_YTD_INCOME,
    AVG(fp.YTD_PROFIT) AS AVG_YTD_PROFIT,
    AVG(fp.LOANS_ADVANCES) AS AVG_LOANS_ADVANCES,
    AVG(fp.DEPOSITS) AS AVG_DEPOSITS,
    AVG(fp.NIM) AS AVG_NIM,
    AVG(fp.COST_INCOME) AS AVG_COST_INCOME,
    AVG(fp.NPL_RATIO) AS AVG_NPL_RATIO,
    AVG(fp.COR) AS AVG_COR,
    AVG(fp.STAGE3_COVER) AS AVG_STAGE3_COVER,
    AVG(fp.ROTE) AS AVG_ROTE
FROM 
    FINANCIAL_PERFORMANCE fp
JOIN 
    BANKS b ON fp.BANK_ID = b.BANK_ID
WHERE 
    fp.YEAR = 2024
GROUP BY 
    b.BANK_NAME
